price: 66 Ils en mangeront, en vérité, à s’en remplir la panse,
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
